overview:
Sean is a software guy with over 20 years of total experience and leadership. He has exceptional experience with complex development projects, full life cycle management, including PM & Client interfacing experience in organizations both large and small.

Know for his love of coding, he has a deep and broad technology understanding focused around use of C# and VB.NET developing applications in both Web and Win32 environments. He believes in Strong Multi-Tier Development approaches (UI Layer, Business Layer, Data Layer) as well as building asynchronous multi-threaded webfarm/cloud based solutions.

Skills Rundown:

Technology Exposure

  • Business Application Development
  • Win32(Client/Server), Internet, Intranet, and Extranet Development (B2B, B2C, and E-Commerce)
  • Business Package Integration (Financials, CRM, ERP, EDI)
  • Methodology Management & Administration
  • Quality Assurance & Testing
  • Enterprise Data Management & Data Warehousing
  • Network Operation Management & Administration (LAN/WAN)
  • Experience with Main Frame & Mini Environment
  • Experience with GUI/Programmable Interface alternatives
  • Many development assistance tools and technologies

Management Exposure

  • Strategic Thinker/Planner
  • Strong Tactical Planning and Operational Execution
  • Strong Client Communication Skills
  • Business Process Improvement Planning & Implementation
  • Disaster Recovery Planning & Plan Implementation
  • Managed Joint Application Sessions, as well as Use Case development, user requirements planning, and project planning.
